function.name: web_search
function.description: Search the web using Google Custom Search API. Uses WebOperationsService.web_search to perform actual searches.

query.description: Search query string - should be descriptive and specific

function.name: read_link
function.description: Read the content of a given URL and return its textual content using WebOperationsService

url.description: URL to read content from - should be a valid HTTP/HTTPS URL

function.name: get_cyoda_guidelines
function.description: Retrieve Cyoda platform guidelines for a specific workflow using WebOperationsService

workflow_name.description: Name of the workflow to get guidelines for

function.name: get_user_info
function.description: Get information about the current user including permissions and preferences

user_id.description: User identifier (optional, uses current user if not provided)

include_permissions.description: Whether to include user permissions in the response
